name: Loop Line!
description:
Game made with SFML for Ludum Dare 47 

- Theme: Stuck in a Loop -

Make your dream come true: Become a train driver and explore the world of Loop Line, while helping with the transportation of passengers!

Controls:

W - Accelerate

S - Break

Stop at stations to pick up and drop off passengers! 

Don’t hit cars, it will scare your passengers off your train! 

Buy upgrades for your train and unlock new stations.
